text: bahudaiva visvasikal parannu: "allahu icchiccirunnenkil nannalea nannalute pitakkanmarea avanekkutate onnineyum pujikkumayirunnilla. avanre vidhiyillate onnum nisid'dhamakkumayirunnilla.â€ avarkku mumpullavarum itutanne ceytittunt. sandesam vyaktamayi etticcukeatukkukayennatallatta entu badhyatayan daivadutanmarkkullat
